sharedContent.title:
6 US senators voted in favor of Republican effort to block counting Arizona’s electoral votes for Joe Biden:

• Sen. Cruz
• Sen. Hawley
• Sen. Kennedy
• Sen. Hyde-Smith
• Sen. Marshall
• Sen. Tuberville

localize.full_text:

·参议员克鲁兹
·参议员…

·参议员肯尼迪

·参议员图贝维尔
